name: Mario Dodge [2008] - Free Mini Game
description:
- A Remake of Super Mario where you dodge flaming Balls across Screen. 
- Move Cursor arrows to pick up items and go for a higher score.
- Flames move faster as your score goes higher.
- When you lose the Game Closes!

Approximate Gameplay: 5 Minutes

*This Copy is Non For Profit

Credits:

Original Programming: Colin Sandquist

Super Mario Creation + Images:  Nintendo, Shigeru Miyamoto

Music: Kirby 64
